battleaxe.name: Battle Axe
battleaxe.description: A thick, heavy axe blade rimmed with steel on the end of a wooden shaft. Ready to crush anything it hits.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: Two beams of wood mounted in a T, with a bowstring connected to a trigger. So simple anyone can use it.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: Is this a dagger that I see before me, the handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee...

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.description: A bow as tall as a person with a stiff string. Perfect for fast shots from far away.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A two-handed iron blade a meter long and a kilogram heavy designed for repeated attacks against strong enemies

garrote.name: Garrote
garrote.description: A thin meter-long wire run between 2 woden handles. Perfect for choking if you can get it around the neck.
garrote.effects: Neither you or target may act. Target absorbs 75% of damage directed at you.

darts.name: Darts
darts.description: Small iron darts with miniature flights carved from feathers. Throw a handful, some might hit

compoundbow.name: Compound Bow
compoundbow.description: A bow with several pulleys holding several strings at relatively loose tension each. Even while it's easier to draw, it launches arrows a lot faster.

magicbow.name: Magic Bow
magicbow.description: A normal longbow, enchanted with a variety of spells.
magicbow.effects: +2 Accuracy. 20% Soul Seal. Every third shot stuns.

knifebracelet.name: Knife Bracelet
knifebracelet.description: A bracelet with a knife sticking out of it.

vampireslash.name: Vampire Slash
vampireslash.description: A wicked slice using sharp vampire claws.
